channel.title: How do i take away ::pickup for everyone but admin?
channel.description:
how do i take away ::pickup for everyone but admin?
please help me because people are picking up bugged items and freezing there accounts...... alot of work for me to jus tkeep wipeing them lol

item.title: How do i take away ::pickup for everyone but admin?
item.dc:creator: @Yakooza Yakooza
item.description:
@Yakooza wrote:

no…
open up client.java
and search for “pickup” including quotes and then after

you should see something like

else if (command.startsWith("pickup")) {

after the ) add this

&& playerRights >= 2

so its like

else if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && playerRights >= 2)

Read full topic
item.source: How do i take away ::pickup for everyone but admin?

item.title: How do i take away ::pickup for everyone but admin?

@Informer wrote:

You have to edit your character file for your server.
